entry.title: Thursday night: Flurries. Low minus 7.
entry.summary: Flurries ending this evening then clearing. Local blowing snow. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 diminishing to 20 gusting to 40 overnight. Low minus 7. Wind chill near minus 15. Forecast issued 3:45 PM EDT Thursday 30 March 2023
